TEXT.English: Sire, as our empire grows, we would be wise to spread our state religion, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Religion[COLOR_REVERT]! Building a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s3_CityName would help us spread the faith to our other cities, increasing their happiness.
TEXT.Chinese: 大人，随着国家的不断扩展，应当更广泛地传播我们的官方信仰，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Religion[COLOR_REVERT]！建造 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT]在%s3_CityName有助于我们向其他城市传扬我们的信仰，为他们带来更多快乐。

TEXT.English: Units are displayed with a single figure
Show extra info in the city bar
TEXT.Chinese: 在城市状态条中显示附加信息

TEXT.English: Show movement range for the active unit
TEXT.Chinese: 显示活动单位的移动范围

TEXT.English: The advisor occasionally interrupts play to suggest a new build choice in a city
TEXT.Chinese: 允许顾问不时推荐城市的建造项目

TEXT.English: Sid provides extra help for the player's research and build choices
TEXT.Chinese: 允许席德向玩家提示科技和建造的帮助信息

TEXT.English: The game will not progress until the player specifies that the turn should end
TEXT.Chinese: 需要玩家手动结束回合才能继续游戏

TEXT.English: Popups are minimized until the player has moved all units
TEXT.Chinese: 弹出窗口先最小化, 直到玩家完成所有单位的移动

TEXT.English: Show the moves of friendly units between turns
TEXT.Chinese: 回合间显示友好单位的移动

TEXT.English: Show the moves of enemy units between turns
TEXT.Chinese: 回合间显示敌方单位的移动

TEXT.English: All of the player's move are accelerated
TEXT.Chinese: 加速所有玩家单位的移动

TEXT.English: The player's combats are accelerated (when on offense)
TEXT.Chinese: 加速玩家单位的战斗动画 (攻击时)

TEXT.English: The player's combats are accelerated (when on defense)
TEXT.Chinese: 加速玩家单位的战斗动画 (防御时)

TEXT.English: All selected units will attack in rapid succession (note: this is purely an interface convenience - the underlying battle mechanics are unchanged)
TEXT.Chinese: 所有选定单位连续快速攻击 (注意: 仅影响界面显示效果 - 实际的战斗机制并未改变)

TEXT.English: The player's units are automatically promoted (if possible) at the beginning of each turn
TEXT.Chinese: 每回合开始时玩家单位自动晋升 (如果可能)

TEXT.English: All workers and work boats start the game as automated
TEXT.Chinese: 所有工人和工船组建后自行动作

TEXT.English: Automated workers will not change previously built improvements
TEXT.Chinese: 自行动作的工人不会改变原有的地块设施

TEXT.English: Show NUM-PAD help for unit movement
TEXT.Chinese: 显示单位移动的小键盘帮助
单位不会自动循环选择

TEXT.English: No unit action or movement recommendations
TEXT.Chinese: 不提示单位应当进行的动作

TEXT.English: Context menu via RIGHT-CLICK (normally available with [SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK])
TEXT.Chinese: 右键单击显示弹出菜单 (默认为 [SHIFT + 左键单击])

TEXT.English: All civilizations conduct their turns at the same time
TEXT.Chinese: 所有文明同时进行其回合

TEXT.English: Players can "hot-join" into an AI civilization's slot at any time
TEXT.Chinese: 玩家可在游戏中途 "热加入" 取代电脑文明的位置

TEXT.English: Civilizations cannot declare war on each other
Turns are limited by a timer which scales based on the size of the largest civilization
TEXT.Chinese: 回合有时间限制, 具体长度基于游戏中最大文明的规模

TEXT.English: Cities cannot be razed after capture
TEXT.Chinese: 城市被攻陷后不可被摧毁

TEXT.English: Cities cannot convert peacefully from culture
TEXT.Chinese: 城市不会因文化的影响而投靠其他文明

TEXT.English: Cities which have been captured via conquest can convert peacefully back to a previous owner
TEXT.Chinese: 城市被武力占领后会和平回归原属文明
增加蛮族的活跃性和攻击性

TEXT.English: AI leaders favor war over diplomacy
TEXT.Chinese: 电脑领袖更倾向于战争手段

TEXT.English: Each AI leader's personality is determined randomly at game start
TEXT.Chinese: 电脑领袖的性格在游戏开始时随机决定

TEXT.English: Technologies cannot be traded via diplomacy
TEXT.Chinese: 不能在外交时交换科技

TEXT.English: Two civilizations can form a Permanent Alliance which lasts the rest of the game
TEXT.Chinese: 两个文明可以结成永久性同盟

TEXT.English: All AI civilizations are at war with the human for the length of the game
TEXT.Chinese: 所有电脑文明在整个游戏过程中与人类玩家处于战争状态

TEXT.English: The human player can never control more than one city
TEXT.Chinese: 人类玩家不能控制一个以上的城市

TEXT.English: All civilizations are locked into either war or peace for the length of the game
TEXT.Chinese: 所有文明在整个游戏过程中保持初始时的战争或和平状态

TEXT.English: You cannot continue creating a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on instead?
TEXT.Chinese: 你无法继续建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望转而进行什么项目？

TEXT.English: You have trained [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: 你已组建了[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望继续进行什么项目？

TEXT.English: You cannot continue training [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on instead?
TEXT.Chinese: 你无法继续训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望转而进行什么项目？

TEXT.English: You have constructed [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: 你已建成了[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望继续进行什么项目？

TEXT.English: You cannot continue constructing [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on instead?
TEXT.Chinese: 你无法继续建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望转而进行什么项目？

TEXT.English: You have created [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: 你已完成了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望继续进行什么项目？

TEXT.English: You cannot continue creating [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on instead?
TEXT.Chinese: 你无法继续建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT]，地点：%s2_CityName。你希望转而进行什么项目？
城市不会因文化影响而叛离

TEXT.English: "We will never trade with you, our worst enemy!!!"
TEXT.Chinese: “我们绝不与你交易，你是最危险的敌人！”

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires Culture of at least %d1%% Own Nationality[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]需要文化至少有%d1%%的本民族文化[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: "You brought in a war ally against us!"
TEXT.Chinese: “你发起了针对我们的军事同盟！”

TEXT.English: "You negotiated a trade embargo against us!"
TEXT.Chinese: “你发起了针对我们的贸易禁运！”
等等！只要...再来...一个...回合...

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Archery Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units get a special first-strike ability that allows them a chance to hit their opponent before regular combat begins.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个投射单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类单位具有先发打击能力，使其有机会在正常战斗开始前即削弱敌方的力量。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Mounted Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units can move farther per turn than regular units, allowing them to wreak havoc behind enemy lines.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个骑乘单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类单位具有更高的移动力，使其能够深入敌后灵活机动地作战。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Melee Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units form the backbone of your earliest armies.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个肉搏单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类单位是你早期军队的主力。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Siege Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units cause collateral damage to the tiles they attack, damaging multiple units at once.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个压制单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类单位具有附带打击能力，能够同时削弱同一区块的多个单位。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Gunpowder Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! All units whose weaponry is based on gunpowder can ignore man-made city fortifications.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个火器单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！火器单位可以更轻易地突破城防要塞。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Armored Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! They are the strongest offensive units available - use them to crush your enemies!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个装甲单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类单位是最强大的攻击力量——运用他们消灭你的敌人吧！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Helicopter Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units can fly over short distances, allowing them to ignore regular terrain costs.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个旋翼单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类单位能低空飞行，移动力不受地形影响。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Naval Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Protecting coastal cities is a crucial part your national defense. Naval units can also blockade enemy towns, preventing them from working adjacent water tiles.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已组建了首个海军单位：([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！保护沿海城市是国防的重要组成部分。海军单位还能封锁敌方城市，使其无法利用海上资源。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have completed your first National Wonder ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1Building_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These powerful buildings are useful for specializing your cities - it is wise to plan ahead, though, as only two National Wonders can be built in each one.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已完成了首个国家级奇观：([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1Building_Name[COLOR_REVERT])，地点：%s2City_Name！此类大型建筑能使你的城市更为专业化——但是要注意做好预先规划，因为每座城市只能建造两座国家级奇观。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have connected your first city (%s1City_Name) with your Capital. Because the cities are connected, they will share resources and increase their commerce.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已建成了第一条连接首都与其他城市(%s1City_Name)的道路。有道路相连的城市可以共享资源，并增加商业收入。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] can build strong melee units.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已获得了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]，一种重要的战略资源！拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]的城市能够组建强大的肉搏单位。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] can build fast mounted units.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已获得了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]，一种重要的战略资源！拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]的城市能够组建骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build strong melee units.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已获得了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]，一种重要的战略资源！拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]的城市能够组建强大的肉搏单位。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to your first luxury resource ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Luxury_Name[COLOR_REVERT])! This resource will create happiness in all cities connected to your Capital, making your citizens easier to manage.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已获得了首个奢侈资源([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Luxury_Name[COLOR_REVERT])！此类资源能提升与首都相连的所有城市的快乐度，使市民更热爱工作。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to your first food resource ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Food_Name[COLOR_REVERT])! This resource will raise the health level in all cities connected to your Capital, encouraging faster growth.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，你已获得了首个食物资源([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Food_Name[COLOR_REVERT])！此类资源能提升与首都相连的所有城市的健康度，使城市更快速地成长。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Half a Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达五十万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds a Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达一百万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Two Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达两百万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Five Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达五百万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Ten Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达一千万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Twenty Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达两千万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Fifty Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达五千万！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds One Hundred Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达一亿！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Two Hundred Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达两亿！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds Five Hundred Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达五亿！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds a BILLION souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达十亿！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now holds TWO BILLION souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你，繁荣兴盛的%s1Civ_Name总人口已达到二十亿！更大的城市能够容纳更多的市民和专业人员，提升我们的生产力！
向 %s1 发送电子邮件成功。
发送电子邮件失败.[NEWLINE]SMTP 主机: %s1[NEWLINE]至: %s2[NEWLINE]自: %s3

TEXT.English: Brings up detailed information about your game's world.
TEXT.Chinese: 为你带来游戏世界的详细信息。

TEXT.English: Visit www.gamespyid.com to manage your account!
TEXT.Chinese: 请访问 www.gamespyid.com 管理你的帐号！

TEXT.English: Toggles display of different trade groups
TEXT.Chinese: 切换显示不同贸易集团

TEXT.English: Toggles display of unit position and density information
TEXT.Chinese: 切换显示单位位置及密度信息

TEXT.English: Toggles display of religion spread and distribution
TEXT.Chinese: 切换显示信仰传播及分布

TEXT.English: Choose a Folder to Play Music From
Pan-Gaia: "One Earth," a massive single continent.
TEXT.Chinese: 泛古陆——即“一块大陆”，全球只有一个单独的大洲。

TEXT.English: Randomly generated map with two or more continents.
TEXT.Chinese: 大洲——随机生成的两块或更多大陆。

TEXT.English: The ultimate water map for Civilization IV. Powerful navies not optional!
TEXT.Chinese: 群岛——文明IV主要的海洋型地图。一定要有强大的海军！

TEXT.English: Terra generates random land masses similar to those of the planet Earth. All players begin in the Old World. These maps are extra large!
TEXT.Chinese: 类地行星——随机生成类似现实地球的大陆。玩家均分布于旧大陆。这种地图非常巨大！

TEXT.English: Randomly generated world without oceans but dotted by lakes.
TEXT.Chinese: 大湖——随机生成没有海洋的地图，仅有一些湖泊。

TEXT.English: A random world experiencing severe glaciation. Sea levels have dropped and habitable lands occur only near the equator.
TEXT.Chinese: 冰川时代——随机生成冰川时代的世界。海平面较低，可居住的土地仅分布于赤道附近。

TEXT.English: Randomly generated regional map that loosely simulates the Great Plains heartland of the USA.
TEXT.Chinese: 大平原——随机生成类似美国中部大平原的区域性地图。

TEXT.English: Randomly generated map, simulates a region covered with hills and peaks.
TEXT.Chinese: 高原——随机生成密布丘陵与山峰的地图。

TEXT.English: The desert region in the middle holds the strategic minerals. The fertile region in the north has less land (but more resources) than the south.
TEXT.Chinese: 绿洲——地图中央为富含战略资源的荒漠。北部的肥沃地带面积较南部为小(但资源较多)。

TEXT.English: A round Pangaea where all players are guaranteed to have the most vital strategic resources within a few plots of their starting location.
TEXT.Chinese: 圆形泛古陆，各玩家初始地域均拥有重要战略资源。

TEXT.English: The result of a mad wizard's experiments, this randomly generated and fanciful world has wildly varying climates and ignores the laws of physics.
TEXT.Chinese: 此地图为疯狂魔法师的作品，地形地貌复杂多样，不合常理。

TEXT.English: Each player starts in a separate region. The regions connect via land bridges to the polar hub at the map's center.
TEXT.Chinese: 每位玩家均拥有独立的初始地域。各地域通过陆桥与地图中心相连。

TEXT.English: A large sea inhabits the center, surrounded by a thick ring of land.
TEXT.Chinese: 地中海——地图中央为广阔海域，周围为环状陆地。

TEXT.English: Each player starts on their own randomly generated island. Extra islands (large or small) may be added.
TEXT.Chinese: 每位玩家拥有单独的大岛。可能还另有一些大小岛屿。

TEXT.English: Novelty map that randomly generates an extremely twisty maze of land and water.
TEXT.Chinese: 随机生成陆地和水域分布极度扭曲的地图。

TEXT.English: Land-based map, randomly generates half a world in the west then mirrors it exactly in the east.
TEXT.Chinese: 以陆地为主的地图，随机生成西半球后再以完全镜像方式生成东半球。

TEXT.English: Each player starts in a separate region. Each region connects to its two immediate neighbors, forming a ring of land that surrounds an isolated polar region.
TEXT.Chinese: 每位玩家拥有分离的初始地域。每块初始地域均与其他两块直接相连，形成环绕地球的陆地。

TEXT.English: You choose how many continents there will be.
Teams are placed on opposite sides of the map with a neutral zone between them.
TEXT.Chinese: 不同组队在地图上两相正对, 并由一块中立区分隔。

TEXT.English: Worlds with a tilted planetary axis (turned on their side) have more severe summers and winters, but their overall climates are similar to standard worlds.
TEXT.Chinese: 地球轴心向一侧倾斜，季节差异将更为分明，但整体气候与标准地图相似。

TEXT.English: Each player starts in a separate region. Regions are connected via land bridges, forming a complete wagon wheel (both ring and hub).
TEXT.Chinese: 每位玩家拥有分离的初始地域。各地域通过陆桥相连，形成完整的车轮形(包括轮辋和轮毂)。

TEXT.English: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all land plots, a foundation for crafting your own land-heavy maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.Chinese: 世界创建器模板：全由陆地区块组成的空白地图，用以作为自行创建陆地为主地图的基础。

TEXT.English: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all water plots, a foundation for crafting your own oceanic maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.Chinese: 世界创建器模板：全由海洋区块组成的空白地图，用以作为自行创建海洋为主地图的基础。
每玩家 2 片 (最多 10 个玩家)

TEXT.English: %s1_leader, during this game you have displayed the leadership abilities of %s2_leader!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_leader，在这局游戏中，你显示了%s2_leader那样的领导才能！
世 界 大 小
世 界 大 小

TEXT.English: Your leader will be chosen at random.

TEXT.Chinese: 游 戏 概 要
游 戏 难 度
游 戏 速 度

TEXT.English: Who do you want to contact?
The network socket encountered an error and was closed. Disconnected.
TEXT.Chinese: 网络连接发生错误。连接中断。

TEXT.English: The network socket could not be created.
The internet game browsing server is unavailable.
TEXT.Chinese: 因特网游戏浏览服务器无法使用。

TEXT.English: The network socket encountered an error. Disconnected from game browsing server.
TEXT.Chinese: 网络连接发生错误。中断与游戏浏览服务器的连接。

TEXT.English: Unable to find internet games due to firewall issues.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于防火墙设置，无法查找因特网游戏。

TEXT.English: The game browsing server is unresponsive.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏浏览服务器无应答。

TEXT.English: We cannot reach the game browsing server due to an unspecified problem.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于未知问题，无法连接游戏浏览服务器。

TEXT.English: The connection to the game browsing server has failed.
TEXT.Chinese: 与游戏浏览服务器的连接失败。

TEXT.English: The username you entered is invalid.
Civilization IV's matchmaking room is not available at this time.
TEXT.Chinese: 文明IV游戏配对室现在无法使用。

TEXT.English: Could not reach the game host.
A valid internet address is required.
Could not negotiate with the host's firewall.
Could not connect to the NAT Negotiation server.
TEXT.Chinese: 无法连接 NAT 协议服务器。

TEXT.English: Our connection attempt failed due to a lack of available memory.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于内存不足，尝试连接失败。

TEXT.English: The host of this game has rejected our connection attempt.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏主机拒绝尝试连接。

TEXT.English: Our connection attempt failed due to an unspecified network error.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于未知网络错误，尝试连接失败。

TEXT.English: We are already connected to this host.
The connection attempt to the host has timed out.
Unable to negotiate with the host's firewall.
TEXT.Chinese: 不能穿越主机的防火墙。

TEXT.English: The connection attempt failed due to an unspecified error.
TEXT.Chinese: 发生未知错误，尝试连接失败。

TEXT.English: We have been disconnected from the server due to an unspecified error.
TEXT.Chinese: 发生朱知错误，服务端的连接中断。

TEXT.English: The server has broken our connection.
The chosen game is currently launching. Unable to connect at this time.
TEXT.Chinese: 所选游戏正在启动。 现在无法连接。

TEXT.English: Our connection has been rejected because we have provided invalid identification data.
TEXT.Chinese: 提供的身份数据无效，连接被拒绝。

TEXT.English: You must enter a valid E-Mail address.
TEXT.Chinese: 你必须输入有效的电子邮件地址。

TEXT.English: The Username you entered is not valid.
This account is currently in use.
The password you entered is incorrect.
Failed to initialize tranfer of the game data file.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏数据文件传输初始化失败。

TEXT.English: Failed to initialize transfer of the map.
Encountered a critical error while transferring the file.
TEXT.Chinese: 传送文件时发生严重错误。

TEXT.English: You have attempted to add an existing buddy.
TEXT.Chinese: 对方已经加入友，不能重复添加。

TEXT.English: The buddy request has been sent.
The buddy request could not be sent.
An error has occured on the buddy list server.
TEXT.Chinese: 好友列表服务器发生错误。

TEXT.English: You must provide a buddy name.
No matching buddy profiles were found.
TEXT.Chinese: 未发现匹配的好友预置。

TEXT.English: Multiple matching profiles were found. Please refine your search criteria.
TEXT.Chinese: 发现多重匹配的好友预置。 请修改搜索条件。

TEXT.English: Unable to act while downloading the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 下载补丁期间不能进行操作。
自 定 义 游 戏
游 戏 后 台
局 域 网 游 戏 大 厅
因 特 网 游 戏 大 厅

TEXT.English: No Barbarians or Animals will appear
The save has been placed in your PBEM folder. Please send it to %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] If you set your e-mail address and SMTP server, saves can be sent from within the game.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏保存在PBEM文件夹中。请将其发送给%s1_leader。[NEWLINE]如已设置了电子邮件地址和SMTP服务器，将可直接在游戏中发送。

TEXT.English: Do you wish to keep this resolution?
TEXT.Chinese: 你希望保持此分辨率吗?

TEXT.English: Unable to start the messaging engine.
This scenario requires the "%s1_ModName" mod.[NEWLINE]The game must restart to load this mod.
TEXT.Chinese: 此剧情需要“%s1_ModName”模组。[NEWLINE]游戏将重启以加载此模组。

TEXT.English: The game must restart to load this mod.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏必须重启以加载此模组。

TEXT.English: There are no updates available at this time.
You may not proceed until the patching process is complete.
TEXT.Chinese: 安装补丁其间不能进行操作。

TEXT.English: An error was encountered while checking for updates.
A patch update is already in progress.

TEXT.Chinese: 读取世界创建器文件“%s1_WBName”失败

TEXT.English: Could not load initial game data.
TEXT.Chinese: 不能加载游戏初始数据。

TEXT.English: Game hosting failed. Check network connections.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏主机错误。 请检查网络连接。

TEXT.English: Failed to open the replay file.
TEXT.Chinese: 无法打开游戏重放文件。

TEXT.English: An error has occurred with the staging room on the server.
TEXT.Chinese: 服务端游戏后台发生错误。

TEXT.English: Usernames must be at least 3 characters long.
TEXT.Chinese: 用户名不可短于三个字符。

TEXT.English: You must provide a player name.
You must provide a game name.
You must provide a valid network address.
TEXT.Chinese: 你需要输入有效网络地址。

TEXT.English: There are no available civs to select.
The selected host is no longer valid.
We have lost our connection to the host.
Warning: The version of our game files do not match our host's.
TEXT.Chinese: 警告: 本机游戏文件与主机不匹配。

TEXT.English: The version of our critical game files do not match our host's.[NEWLINE]Cannot join game!
TEXT.Chinese: 本机关键游戏文件与主机不匹配。[NEWLINE]无法加入游戏！

TEXT.English: Unable to find the chosen Map Script file.
TEXT.Chinese: 无法找到所选地图脚本文件。

TEXT.English: Cannot launch game until all players are ready.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有玩家都准备好后才能开始游戏。

TEXT.English: Please wait. Game data transfers are in progress.
TEXT.Chinese: 请等待。 正在传送游戏数据。
玩 家 详 情

TEXT.English: The patch has been successfully downloaded.[NEWLINE]Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 补丁成功下载.[NEWLINE]请按确定按钮关闭游戏并安装补丁。

TEXT.English: The patch could not be successfully downloaded!
You must update your game before continuing.
TEXT.Chinese: 你必须升级游戏才能继续。

TEXT.English: An update is available for the game!
Would you like to be added to %s1_BuddyName's buddy list?
TEXT.Chinese: 你希望被加入 %s1_BuddyName 的好友列表吗?

TEXT.English: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1_Name[COLOR_REVERT] must be a buddy to receive messages from you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Would you to add [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_Name[COLOR_REVERT] to your buddy list?
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1_Name[COLOR_REVERT] 必须成为好友才能收到你的消息.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]你希望将 [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_Name[COLOR_REVERT] 加为好友吗?

TEXT.English: A choice will be made at random. Selecting this option proves you are tough.
TEXT.Chinese: 随机选择。如为高手可选此项。

TEXT.English: You are not permitted to load Multiplayer games in Single-Player mode!
TEXT.Chinese: 你不能在单人游戏模式下加载多人游戏！

TEXT.English: %s1_Name has been kicked from the game.
You have been kicked from the game. Exiting...
TEXT.Chinese: 你已被踢出游戏。 正在结束...

TEXT.English: Save the current game and continue playing
Save the current game and continue later
TEXT.Chinese: 保存当前游戏, 以后再继续

TEXT.English: We are waiting for %s1_Names to reconnect to the game.[NEWLINE]If you would like to stop waiting, please vote on how to proceed.
TEXT.Chinese: 正在等待 %s1_Names 重新进入游戏.[NEWLINE]如果你不希望等待, 请投票选择处理方式。

TEXT.English: The players have chosen to continue to wait.
Enter your existing GameSpy ID and password to login.
TEXT.Chinese: 输入你的 GameSpy 用户名和密码登录。
创 建 新 帐 号

TEXT.English: Enter your email address, desired user name, and password to create a new GameSpy account.
TEXT.Chinese: 输入你的电子邮件地址, 希望使用的用户名和密码以创建新的 GameSpy 帐号。
添 加 新 好 友

TEXT.English: Once you add a person to your buddy list, you can send them direct messages.
TEXT.Chinese: 如已加为好友, 你将可直接向对方发送消息。
移 除 当 前 好 友

TEXT.English: Are you sure you want to remove this buddy?
TEXT.Chinese: 你确定要移除此位好友吗?
好 友 请 求

TEXT.English: To directly chat with a member, they must first be added to your buddy list. Do you want to add %s1_Name as a buddy now?
TEXT.Chinese: 要直接与成员交谈, 对方必须已加入你的好友列表。 你希望将 %s1_Name 加为好友吗?
好 友 请 求
有 新 的 升 级 补丁

TEXT.English: An update is available. Would you like to get it?
TEXT.Chinese: 有新的升级补丁。 你希望下载吗?
需 要 的 补 丁

TEXT.English: You must update your game before proceeding.
TEXT.Chinese: 你必须先升级游戏才能继续
下 载 完 毕

TEXT.English: The patch has been successfully downloaded. Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 补丁已成功下载。按 确定 关闭游戏并安装补丁。
下 载 失 败

TEXT.English: The patch failed to downloaded successfully.

TEXT.Chinese: 正 在 下 载...
需 要 密 码

TEXT.English: Please enter the required password for this game.
Enter a password if you'd like to protect your game.[NEWLINE]Leave the password blank to waive protection.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果希望保护你的游戏, 请输入密码.[NEWLINE]或留空以放弃保护。

TEXT.English: You have trained a unit ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_Unit[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2_City...
TEXT.Chinese: 你训练了一个单位: ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_Unit[COLOR_REVERT]), 地点: %s2_City...

TEXT.English: You have constructed a building ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_Building[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2_City...
TEXT.Chinese: 你完成了一座建筑: ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_Building[COLOR_REVERT]), 地点: %s2_City...

TEXT.English: You have created a project ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Project[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2_City...
TEXT.Chinese: 你完成了一项大工程: ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Project[COLOR_REVERT]), 地点: %s2_City...

TEXT.English: You can now convert to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Religion[COLOR_REVERT] as a State Religion...
TEXT.Chinese: 现在你可以将 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Religion[COLOR_REVERT] 定为官方信仰...

TEXT.English: Choose a new technology to research...
You can now adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Civic[COLOR_REVERT] Civic...
TEXT.Chinese: 现在你可以实行 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_Civic[COLOR_REVERT] 法令...

TEXT.English: %d1 from Population (%d2_pop/%d3_pop_max)[NEWLINE]%d4 from Land (%d5_land/%d6_land_max)[NEWLINE]%d7 from Technology (%d8_tech/%d9_tech_max)[NEWLINE]%d10 from Wonders (%d11_wonder/%d12_wonder_max)[NEWLINE]------------------------[NEWLINE]Total Score = %d13[NEWLINE]Score by winning this turn = %d14
TEXT.Chinese: %d1 来自人口 (%d2_pop/%d3_pop_max)[NEWLINE]%d4 来自领土 (%d5_land/%d6_land_max)[NEWLINE]%d7 来自科技(%d8_tech/%d9_tech_max)[NEWLINE]%d10 来自奇观 (%d11_wonder/%d12_wonder_max)[NEWLINE]------------------------[NEWLINE]总积分 = %d13[NEWLINE]本回合胜利可获积分 = %d14
输 入 文 明 密 码

TEXT.English: Please enter the required password for this Civ.
The password you entered was incorrect. Please try again.
TEXT.Chinese: 你输入的密码不正确。 请重新输入。
保 护 你 的 文 明

TEXT.English: Enter a password to protect your Civilization, or leave it blank to waive password protection.
TEXT.Chinese: 输入密码以保护你的文明, 或留空以放弃保护。

TEXT.English: The tutorial map script could not be found.
Restarting in order to load tutorial...
Disable the control for changing game speed
Disable the control for changing player handicap
Disable the controls for selecting specific game options
Disable the controls for selecting specific victory conditions
TEXT.Chinese: 禁用选择胜利条件功能

TEXT.English: Disable the controls for setting maximum number of turns
TEXT.Chinese: 禁用设制回合上限功能

TEXT.English: Disable the controls for setting number of razed cities before elimination
TEXT.Chinese: 禁用设置灭亡文明所需摧毁城市数量功能

TEXT.English: When trading for a peace treaty, only one player may offer items to another player. Only gifts may be offered as payment for ending war, no trades can be made.
TEXT.Chinese: 谈判和平条约时, 只有一方可附加条款。 请求结束战争时, 只能提供赠礼, 不能附带交易。
哇哈哈哈！祝你好运，小子！

TEXT.English: Username for SMTP Secure Password Authentication (if required)
Password for SMTP Secure Password Authentication (if required)
This Civ has already been claimed.

TEXT.Chinese: 不显示单位或设施动画

TEXT.English: This will move the unit into a specified transport.
TEXT.Chinese: 这将移动单位进入指定运输单位。

TEXT.English: Are you sure you wish to exit to desktop?
The Civilization and Leader will be chosen randomly.
The Leader will be chosen randomly.
You may not change resolutions while playing the tutorial.
TEXT.Chinese: 教程进行期间不能改变分辨率。

TEXT.English: Your machine is below recommended specifications. The graphic settings were altered to accomodate this, however, you may experience performance issues.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的电脑配置低于推荐配置。图像设置将进行调整适应，但是运行仍然可能出现问题。

TEXT.English: This scenario begins the world in the High Middle Ages. While the Americas are still almost empty, in the Old World the Crusades and the Mongol invasion are about to start.
TEXT.Chinese: 本剧情自中古时代开始。当时美洲大陆少人居住，在亚欧大陆，十字军东征和蒙古人西征即将展开。

TEXT.English: What if civilizations started developing 20000 years before present?
TEXT.Chinese: 如果文明自二万年前起就开始发展，到现在会是何种情况?

TEXT.English: This scenario begins in 600BC and lets you control one of the three rising powers of the Classical Mediterranean.
TEXT.Chinese: 本剧情自公元前600年开始，你将可以控制古代地中海区域的三大强权之一。

TEXT.English: World War II: The North African Campaign
TEXT.Chinese: 第二次世界大战: 北非战场

TEXT.English: No map scripts could be found!
System Message: Trade Renegotiation has begun.
TEXT.Chinese: 系统消息: 贸易续约谈判开始。

TEXT.English: Someone else has logged in using this account.
TEXT.Chinese: 有人已使用此帐号登录。

TEXT.English: Someone else has logged in using this account. Exiting to main menu...
TEXT.Chinese: 有人已使用此帐号登录。 返回主菜单...

TEXT.English: What would you like to name this settlement?
TEXT.Chinese: 你希望如何命名此定居点?

TEXT.English: The save file you have selected requires the following mod to be loaded:[NEWLINE][BOLD]%s1[\BOLD][NEWLINE]The application must restart, ok?
TEXT.Chinese: 你选择的存档文件需要载入以下模组: [NEWLINE][BOLD]%s1[\BOLD][NEWLINE] 程序将重新启动。你确定吗?

TEXT.English: The file %s1 already exists.[NEWLINE]Press OK to proceed, overwriting the file.
TEXT.Chinese: 文件 %s1 已存在.[NEWLINE]点击确定按钮覆盖原有文件。

TEXT.English: Building models won't be displayed in Globe View
TEXT.Chinese: 建筑模型不在全球视图上显示

TEXT.English: ©2005 Firaxis Games, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Manufactured and marketed by Take Two Interactive, New York, NY.
TEXT.Chinese: ©Firaxis 游戏公司版权所有. Take Two 交互娱乐公司代理发行. 塞爱维·文明联盟俱乐部完全汉化,

TEXT.English: All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
TEXT.Chinese: 本汉化包由塞爱维·文明联盟俱乐部 (www.civclub.net) 汉化组制作发布.

TEXT.English: Restarting in order to exit tutorial...

TEXT.Chinese: 发 送 地 图...
接 收 地 图...

TEXT.English: Waiting for peers to complete map transfer
TEXT.Chinese: 等待对方完成地图传送

TEXT.English: Sending map to clients. Please wait...
TEXT.Chinese: 主机正在传送地图。 请等待...

TEXT.English: You have selected an unusable voice capture device. Voice capture disabled.
TEXT.Chinese: 你选择了不可用的语音获取设备。 语音获取被禁用。

TEXT.English: You have selected an unusable voice playback device. Voice playback disabled.
TEXT.Chinese: 你选择了不可用的语音回放设备。 语音回放被禁用。

TEXT.English: We have lost our connection to the PitBoss! Exiting to main menu...
TEXT.Chinese: 与 PitBoss 的连接中断! 返回主菜单...
同步数值: 同步=%d1_Num; 选项=%d2_Num

TEXT.English: The game has gone Out Of Sync.[NEWLINE]Please check OOS values (next to scores).[NEWLINE]The player with different values should reconnect in order to resync.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏数据无法保持同步.[NEWLINE]请检查同步数值 (积分后面).[NEWLINE]数值不同的玩家需要重新连接以保持同步。

TEXT.English: Nicknames may not begin with a number, '$', '#', '%%', '&', or '@'
We are being kicked from the game! Exiting to main menu...
TEXT.Chinese: 我们被踢出游戏! 正在返回主菜单...

TEXT.English: Our login attempt has timed out. The authentication server may be down.
TEXT.Chinese: 登录尝试超时。授权服务器可能中断。

TEXT.English: The password is incorrect for the provided E-Mail address.
TEXT.Chinese: 电子邮件地址对应的口令不正确。

TEXT.English: This login name has already been claimed by another account.
TEXT.Chinese: 登录名称已被其他帐号占用。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can build at a minimum latitude of %d1 degrees[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]可建造位置的最低纬度为%d1度[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can build at a maximum latitude of %d1 degrees[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]可建造位置的最高纬度为%d1度[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Regenerate Map Using Current Map Script
TEXT.Chinese: 使用当前地图脚本重新生成地图

TEXT.English: The people of %s1_CityName wish to join our illustrious empire! Shall we welcome them?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_CityName 的居民希望加入我们伟大的文明! 我们要欢迎他们吗?
对! 任命一位新市长...

TEXT.English: Enter the city screen for this City
Your machine is below minimum specifications. Civ4 will not run on this hardware setup.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的机器配置低于基本需求。游戏无法正常运行。

TEXT.English: Determines the quality of texture displayed in-game.
TEXT.Chinese: 选择游戏显示帖图质量等级。

TEXT.English: The game will run in a window when not set.
TEXT.Chinese: 可切换至在窗口中显示。

TEXT.English: Lower resolution textures will be used
The specified file does not exist.[NEWLINE]Please select a valid file name.
TEXT.Chinese: 文件不存在.[NEWLINE]请选择有效文件名。

TEXT.English: The save file you have selected is protected to ensure that the assets in your mod folder have not been changed.
TEXT.Chinese: 所选存档文件受到保护, 以确定模组文件夹中的相关数据未被改动。

TEXT.English: Cannot load version %d1, expected version %d2 or lower
TEXT.Chinese: 不能载入 %d1 版本, 需要 %d2 或更低版本

TEXT.English: This extremely long game speed will allow almost an entire normal game's worth of turns for each era.
TEXT.Chinese: 超长的游戏进程, 每一时代的回合数相当与标准游戏的全部回合数。
工人自动工作时不砍伐森林

TEXT.English: Automated workers will not chop down forests
TEXT.Chinese: 工人自动进行工作, 但不砍伐森林

TEXT.English: Adds a sign to a specific plot that you and your teammates can see.
TEXT.Chinese: 在某一地块上添加标记, 同一组队玩家可见。
%s1 与 %s2 签订共同防御条约

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + S] to add a sign to the map that you and your teammates can see...
TEXT.Chinese: 按下 [ALT + S] 在地图上添加标记, 同一组队玩家可见...

TEXT.English: You are now welcome to take your turn in the Civ4 Pitboss game "%s1_Name"!
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎加入文明IV Pitboss 游戏 "%s1_Name"！

TEXT.English: Your turn will expire in %d1_timer hours.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的回合将在 %d1_timer 小时后到期。

TEXT.English: Modify the Message of the Day
Log of sent and received chat messages
Provide a Message of the Day
Provide SMTP information to send reminder emails
TEXT.Chinese: 提供 SMTP 信息以发送提醒邮件

TEXT.English: SMTP server address or domain name
TEXT.Chinese: SMTP 服务器地址或域名

TEXT.English: You must install the latest update to continue
TEXT.Chinese: 你必须安装最新升级才能继续

TEXT.English: Press ok to shut down and install the patch
TEXT.Chinese: 按 确定 退出并安装补丁

TEXT.English: Would you like to install the latest updates?
TEXT.Chinese: 你要安装最新升级补丁吗?

TEXT.English: Please enter a name for your game
Please enter a password for your game
Turn Timer value must be an integer
TEXT.Chinese: 回合计时器数值必须为整数

TEXT.English: A memory error was encountered while downloading the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 下载补丁时发生内存错误。

TEXT.English: Our computer could not handle the rate that the data was sent! Verify your network speed is correct in game options.
TEXT.Chinese: 本机无法确保数据发送速度! 请在游戏选项中查看网络速度。

TEXT.English: The URL specified for this patch is not valid.
TEXT.Chinese: 下载补丁的链接信息无效。

TEXT.English: The host name specified for this patch is not valid.
TEXT.Chinese: 补丁指定的主机名不可用。

TEXT.English: There was a network resource error while downloading the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 下载补丁时发生网络资源错误。

TEXT.English: We were unable to connect to the server hosting the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 无法连接发布补丁的服务器。

TEXT.English: The server hosting the patch sent us a strange response.
TEXT.Chinese: 发布补丁的服务器返回异常信息。

TEXT.English: Our request for the patch has been rejected by the server.
TEXT.Chinese: 服务器拒绝下载补丁的请求。

TEXT.English: We are not authorized to access the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们没有获得下载补丁的授权。

TEXT.English: The retrieval of the patch has been forbidden on this server.
The specified file for this patch could not be found on the server.
TEXT.Chinese: 服务器上补丁所指定的文件不存在。

TEXT.English: The server hosting the patch has encountered an internal error.
TEXT.Chinese: 发布补丁的服务器发生内部错误

TEXT.English: An error was encountered while trying to write data to our disk.
TEXT.Chinese: 本机磁盘写入数据出错。

TEXT.English: An error was encountered while trying to read data from our disk.
TEXT.Chinese: 本机磁盘读取数据出错。

TEXT.English: The download of the patch was interrupted.
The patch file is too large to be downloaded.
An error occurred while trying to encrypt the patch data.
The patch download has been canceled.
An unknown error has occurred while downloading the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: 补丁下载时出现未知错误。

TEXT.English: Please visit www.CivIV.com for the latest patching information.
TEXT.Chinese: 请访问 www.CivIV.com 查看最新补丁信息。

TEXT.English: You are attempting to load a corrupt save file. The game will now exit.
TEXT.Chinese: 你正尝试载入已损坏的存档文件。游戏将退出。

TEXT.English: %d1 Gold Per Turn Available For Trade
TEXT.Chinese: %d1 金币/回合 可用于交易

TEXT.English: A new random seed is generated every time the game is reloaded - which, for example, will lead to different combat results
TEXT.Chinese: 每次加载游戏时重新生成随机种子 - 这样可能使战斗结果发生改变
重载游戏时重新生成随机种子

TEXT.English: Sets a random admin password so that debug tools cannot be used, and the game assets cannot be modified. Only for single-player games.
TEXT.Chinese: 随机设置管理密码以禁止使用调试工具, 禁止修改游戏数据。本选项仅适用于单机游戏。

TEXT.English: Using the MemorySaver option in your configuration does not allow device loss. Exiting program.
TEXT.Chinese: 在设置文件中启用内存节省 (MemorySaver) 选项将禁止设备中断。正在退出程序。

TEXT.English: Failed to allocate video memory. Please try reducing your graphics settings.
TEXT.Chinese: 无法分配足够显示内存。请尝试降低图像质量设置。

TEXT.English: A high detail terrain will be used

In 1775 the 13 British Colonies in North America broke out in open revolution against the empire and sought to forge their own path alone as an independent nation. Citing exploitive practices by the British Empire, the Colonists were angered over what they saw as unjust taxation, lack of representation in the British government, and in the case of some, loss of potential fortunes which could be made trading with other parts of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Following the Battles at Lexington, Concord and Bunker Hill the British are bottled up in Boston by the newly formed Colonial Continental Army led by General George Washington. However, the Colonies are fragile and have nowhere near the resources of a worldwide empire, so the situation is dangerous for both sides. Shall you help lead the Colonies into freedom or fight to keep the Empire intact?
TEXT.Chinese: 1775年，北美的13块英属殖民地发动了一场反抗英国统治的革命，以寻求建立一个独立自主的国家。殖民地人民对于英国统治者长期以来掠夺盘剥的政策已经忍无可忍，包括不公平的税收，缺乏参与政府管理的权利，以及限制发展海外贸易的潜在机会等。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在莱克星顿，康科德和邦克山等一系列战役之后，英国军队已被乔治·华盛顿将军率领的大陆军围困于波士顿城中。但是，新生的殖民地政权尚未完全稳固，其控制的资源无法与领土广阔的大英帝国相比，因此局势对双方来说都十分危险。你是想要领导殖民地人民获得自由，还是想要努力维持大英帝国的统治?
作为任何一方建造以下工程的前提条件:[SPACE]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]需要以下前提条件: 任何一方完成[LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Maintenance Costs from Number of Cities
Skips Wonder, Religion, and Victory Movies
TEXT.Chinese: 跳过奇观, 宗教与胜利视频

TEXT.English: Shows City Radius when a Settler is Selected
TEXT.Chinese: 当选择移民时提示城市影响范围

TEXT.English: Must kill all cities AND units to wipe out an enemy civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: 必须摧毁所有城市及单位才能消灭敌对文明。
分形——无法预料的地图类型

TEXT.English: Randomly creates a Pangaea, Continents, Archipelago, or Fractal map.
TEXT.Chinese: 多变——随机生成泛古陆、大洲、群岛或是分形类型的地图。

TEXT.English: An incoming player has failed to connect to you and is unable to join the game.[NEWLINE]Please verify that your firewall allows incoming connections for Civilization IV.
TEXT.Chinese: 某位玩家未能成功建立连接, 无法加入游戏.[NEWLINE]请确保本机防火墙允许游戏传入连接。

TEXT.English: We were unable to connect to the player "%s1_Name".[NEWLINE]This player may not have his firewall environment properly configured.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们无法与 "%s1_Name" 建立连接.[NEWLINE]该玩家主机防火墙设置可能存在问题。

TEXT.English: We were unable to connect to another joining player.[NEWLINE]This player may not have his firewall environment properly configured.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们无法与某位玩家建立连接.[NEWLINE]该玩家主机防火墙设置可能存在问题。

TEXT.English: There was an error when attempting to read the scenario data.
TEXT.Chinese: 读取剧情数据时发生错误

TEXT.English: The value must be an integer.
The value must be an integer.
Player %d1_ID has different versions of some game files.[NEWLINE]Verify that this is a trusted player.
TEXT.Chinese: %d1_ID 的某些游戏文件版本不正确.[NEWLINE]请确保对方是可信任的玩家。

TEXT.English: There are no WorldBuilder saves available for this mod to load as a scenario.
TEXT.Chinese: 此模组没有可作为剧情载入的存档文件。

TEXT.English: There are no map script files available for this mod.
TEXT.Chinese: 此模组没有可用的地图脚本。

TEXT.English: Please enter the required admin password for this game.

TEXT.Chinese: 启用自动存档, 间隔时间=%d1

TEXT.English: Your movies are not installed correctly.
